quotes.quote: Some of us wake up. Others roll over.
Wake up determined. Go to bed satisfied.
Wake up to find out that you are the eyes of the world.
The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
Don't let your alarm clock, be the only reason you wake up.
One day you wake up and realize the world can be conquered.
The greatest healing would be to wake up from what we are not.
You should wake up every day looking for the trouble you can get into.
Wake up early everyday so that while others are still dreaming, you can make your dreams come true.
When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
We dream of the world we could have made, and wake up in the world that we did.
We wake up one day and find we have lost our dreams in order to protect our days.
Live your dream and never wake up.
One day you will wake up & there won’t be any more time to do the things you’ve always wanted. Do it now.
Wake up. Get out of your mind. Be present.
Wake up and live. It's a fast world out there.
Dream big. Wake up. Take the first step into the unknown.
Dreams are only dreams until you wake up and make them real.
You can wake up every day and make today better than the last.
When you wake up in the morning, smile - and get it over with.
You have to wake up and you have to run if you want to survive.
Every day we wake up, we have an opportunity to do some good, but there's so much bad that you have to navigate to get to the good.
Wake up this morning knowing that the possibility for love is closer.
Be patient. You’ll know when it’s time for you to wake up and move ahead.
Wake up everyday stronger than yesterday, face your fears and wipe your tears.
